level.heading: Disposition of records during and after termination of liquidation.
level.text: Whenever it shall appear to the Commissioner that the records of any insurer in process of liquidation or completely liquidated are no longer useful, he or she may recommend to the court, and the court shall direct, what records should be retained for future reference and what records should be destroyed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-35
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-35, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-1301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-268
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-1301.
